Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete public website with premium UI design

Implemented all 4 epics for Santa Maria Residences:

Epic 1: Foundation & Database
- Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS setup
- Supabase integration with 204 apartments seeded
- RLS policies for public read / admin update

Epic 2: Public Building Exploration
- Hybrid building visualization with real tower image
- Elevator panel navigation with jump-to-floor
- Premium floor glow band with in-band labels
- Accessibility icons (check/clock/lock) for colorblind safety

Epic 3: Admin Authentication
- Login page with Supabase Auth
- Protected routes for /admin
- Logout functionality

Epic 4: Admin Inventory Management
- Dashboard with summary cards
- Status filtering and single-click updates
- Inline notes editing

Design System:
- 8px spacing grid
- Inter font with typography scale
- Emerald accent with semantic status colors
- Premium tooltips with motion
- Decision cards with price estimates

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
